name: Organic Compost Mix
description: A rich organic compost that improves soil fertility and promotes healthy plant growth.

name: All-Purpose Fertilizer
description: Balanced fertilizer suitable for all types of plants to ensure strong roots and lush foliage.

name: Watering Can (Metal)
description: A stylish metal watering can with a long spout for easy and even watering.

name: Gardening Tool Set
description: A complete gardening toolkit with trowel, rake, pruner, gloves, and a carrying case.

name: Plant Spray Bottle
description: Durable spray bottle for misting indoor and outdoor plants to keep them hydrated and fresh.

name: Neem Oil Pest Control
description: Natural pest repellent derived from neem seeds, safe for all plant types.

name: Soil pH Tester
description: Digital soil pH meter to ensure your plants are growing in the ideal soil conditions.

name: Pruning Shears
description: Ergonomic pruning scissors for trimming branches and promoting healthy plant growth.
